  • Constructor Details

    • ClientPlayerBoard

      public ClientPlayerBoard​(boolean isMine, int order, java.lang.String username)
      Initialize the client playerboard
      Parameters:
      isMine - set true if the owner is the same as the player that opens this client instance
      order - player order in the client game
      username - the name of playerboard's owner

    • ClientPlayerBoard

      public ClientPlayerBoard​(ClientFaithPath faithPath, ClientWarehouse warehouse, ClientStrongbox strongbox, ClientLeaderCardDeck clientLeaderCards, ClientDevelopmentCardDecks developmentCards, boolean isMine, int victoryPoints, java.lang.String username, int order)
      Initialize the client playerboard passing all parameters
      Parameters:
      faithPath - user's faith path
      warehouse - user's warehouse
      strongbox - user's strongbox
      clientLeaderCards - user's leader cards deck
      developmentCards - user's development cards deck
      isMine - set true if the owner is the same as the player that opens this client instance
      victoryPoints - user's victory points
      username - the name of the playerboard's owner
      order - the player order in the client game
